original_text: The Lord, Israel's God, has a message about the houses in this city and about the royal palaces of Judah's kings. The people have knocked down the city's buildings. They have used the stones to make the city's walls stronger, 5 to fight against Babylon's army. The Lord says, “The city's houses will be full of dead bodies. I am very angry with the people in the city and I will kill them. I will refuse to help this city because of the wicked things that its people have done.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께서 말씀하시니라 무리가 이 성읍의 가옥과 유다 왕궁을 헐어서 갈대아인의 참호와 칼을 대항하여

sentences.original_text: The Lord, Israel's God, has a message
sentences.korean_translation: 주, 이스라엘의 하나님께서 메시지를 가지고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: about the houses in this city
and about the royal palaces of Judah's kings
The people have knocked down the city's buildings
They have used the stones to make the city's walls stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 돌들을 사용하여 도시의 성벽을 더 강하게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: The city's houses will be full of dead bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 도시의 집들은 죽은 시체로 가득할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I am very angry with the people in the city
I will refuse to help this city
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 도시를 도와주는 것을 거부할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: because of the wicked things that its people have done
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시의 사람들이 행한 악한 일들 때문에
